title: Can u suggest me some books from where I can read tricks to solve quant ques for SSC CGL? - Quora
tags: Staff Selection Commission Combined Graduate Level Exam

response.answer_text: For getting good marks in quant section u dont have to go for short tricks at all. If u have good calculation speed then believe me time km ni pdega. U just need to Practise as much as possible to improve your efficiency. Get kiran or rakes yadav's book and solve it 3–4 times and your efficiency is gonna get better with time. All the best.
